name: Holeroids
description:
Web version is buggy apparently(play fullscreen for better results)

This game is for our second game jam Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1 YAY!
Basic controls:
Fire1: Left ctrl/mouse1
Fire2: Left shift/mouse2
Jump: Space bar
Movement: WASD/arrow keys
it should be playable with controller but the ui is buggy.
The idea of the game is to destroy the space junk to colect points that you can exchange for upgrades to your spaceship. We included a small "cutscene" tutorial for more info.
In the options you can change the music and volume.
First time trying to use pixel perfect camera.

All the art was made by damian1ilin.
The great music is from theraven.that.refused.to.sing
I made everything else in unity and the sound in bfxr + Audacity.
